title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer and open the context menu, the 'Team' entry is missing.
EB: I expect to see the 'Team' entry in the context menu when I select a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Open the context menu and verify that the 'Team' entry is missing.
